title: DID NOT RECEIVE ICONS FOR CHAOS VS. ORDER EVENT
body: Hello, I've yet to receive either icon even though ive played a great amount of matchmade games recently. I really want to get in on it! Thanks!

replies.body: Which icons were you referring to specifically? I pulled up your account and it doesn't actually look like you took part in the VS Event in order to get any of the icons.
I'm not sure if I read it wrong, but I thought I was supposed to get two icons after completing any match.  It doesnt say there are any missions I can complete
They are in your loot section.  The free icon you got for completing 7 missions just needs to be opened like a chest.  All other icons need to be purchased with the tokens.
